body_html:
Oops, forgot to update this issue.

This has been resolved. To remap a control input, use the F_ImportGraphDefOptionsRemapControlDependency method: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h#L922

The -1 trick should still work too, although I think is technically undefined behavior.
body_text:
Oops, forgot to update this issue.
This has been resolved. To remap a control input, use the F_ImportGraphDefOptionsRemapControlDependency method: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h#L922
The -1 trick should still work too, although I think is technically undefined behavior.
body:
Oops, forgot to update this issue.

This has been resolved. To remap a control input, use the `F_ImportGraphDefOptionsRemapControlDependency` method: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h#L922

The -1 trick should still work too, although I think is technically undefined behavior.
